description.message: Like uc / userChromeJS+Sub-Script Loader, loads user scripts that uses WebExtension APIs via WebDAV server.

popup_oepnOptionsPageButton.description: Menu item to popup when user click the browser’s toolbar icon.

options_directorySettingPlaceholderPort.description: Part of the placeholder of the text box in the options page. That whole will look like “http://localhost:PORT/PATH/”.

options_directorySettingPlaceholderPath.description: Part of the placeholder of the text box in the options page. That whole will look like “http://localhost:PORT/PATH/”.

options_directorySettingPatternDescripti.message: Please enter a URL starting with “http://localhost” and ending with “/”.
options_directorySettingPatternDescripti.description: Description of the pattern of the directory URL setting in the options page. (title attribute value)

options_directorySettingExtensionsDescri.message: Loads $_UC_JS$ and $_UC_ES$ which is directly under the specified WebDAV directory when this add-on startup.
options_directorySettingExtensionsDescri.description: Description of the directory URL setting in the options page. Must not escape special characters in the “message” key value.

options_directorySettingMethodsDescripti.message: The WebDAV server needs not to allow methods other than $PROPFIND$ or $GET$.
options_directorySettingMethodsDescripti.description: Description of the directory URL setting in the options page. Must not escape special characters in the “message” key value.

options_loadedScriptsLabel.description: Caption of the script list in the options page.

options_scriptsNotLoadedMessage.description: Message in the script list in the options page.

options_metaDataNotExistedValidationMess.description: Message in the script list in the options page.

options_requiredKeysNotExistedValidation.message: A valid $KEY$ keys do not exist.
options_requiredKeysNotExistedValidation.description: Message in the script list in the options page. Must not escape special characters in the “message” key value.

options_alreadyLoadedDescription.message: The checked scripts will be re-fetched each time pages are visited.
options_alreadyLoadedDescription.description: Description of the script list in the options page.

options_changingMetaDataNotice.message: Changes you make to $KEY$ are not applied until this add-on are reloaded.
options_changingMetaDataNotice.description: Description of the script list in the options page. Must not escape special characters in the “message” key value.

options_backgroundScriptsNotice.message: Scripts running on $INCLUDE$, regardless of the settings, are loaded when this add-on startup only.
options_backgroundScriptsNotice.description: Description of the script list in the options page. Must not escape special characters in the “message” key value.

options_submitButton.description: Label of the submit button in the options page.

sidebar_loadedScriptsCaption.description: Content of the summary element in the side bar.
